doc_context:
path /v3/blockchain/marketplace/listing/buy
opid buyassetonmarketplace
params None
sum buy an asset on the nft marketplace
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
chain
desc the blockchain to work with
enum
bsc
eth
klay
matic
one
type string
contractaddress
maxlength 42
minlength 42
desc the blockchain address of the marketplace smart contract
type string
listingid
type string
desc the id of the listing with the asset that you want to buy
minlength 1
maxlength 200
fromprivatekey
type string
maxlength 66
minlength 66
desc the private key of the blockchain address from which the fee will be deducted
amount
desc only if you pay with the native blockchain currency the price of the asset that you want to buy plus the marketplace fee do not use if you pay with fungible tokens
pattern ddd
type string
erc20address
maxlength 42
minlength 42
desc only if you pay with the fungible tokens the blockchain address of the fungible tokens do not use if you pay with the native blockchain currency
type string
buyer
maxlength 42
minlength 42
desc only if you want to buy the asset on behalf of someone else and this person wants to pay with the fungible tokens for example for buying the asset from a custodial wallet address the blockchain address of the buyer on whose behalf you are buying the assetthe buyer must allow the marketplace smart contract to access their tokens before you make the purchase
type string
nonce
type number
desc the nonce to be set to the transaction if not present the last known nonce will be used
fee
desc the custom defined fee if not present will be calculated automatically
type object
required
gaslimit
gasprice
props
gasprice
type string
desc the price for one gas unit in gwei
pattern d
gaslimit
type string
desc the maximum number of gas units that you are willing to spend on processing the transaction at the provided gas price
pattern d
schName customfee
